name: Lightbird [Alpha]
description:
LIGHTBIRD [Demo]

Enter the mesmerizing and beautiful world of Lightbird, an atmospheric endless flyer that's as challenging and rewarding as you make it.

Every eon a new Lightbird is born! Soar gracefully through the skies and the Floating Stones to collect feathers and grow into your destiny.

This game is still in development, but the demo is available for the #devtober game jam. A lot of this project, including the name Lightbird, is still work in progress, and is subject to change. Stay tuned, and enjoy the demo!

Follow for updates on Twitter
